fulltext:
Le Van Khai 
Full-stack Web Developer 
PERSONAL INFORMATION
Year of Birth: 1994 
Github: github.com/khaile 
OVERALL ASSESSMENT
I am a full-stack web developer with 3 years of experience. I have done everything from the most 
basic refactoring to set up and deploy web apps to production. And have experience in building 
RESTful APIs with Rails, implementing modern web UI with React. Also, I am interested in 
writing clean and beautiful code. 
E DUCATION  H ISTORY
2012 – 2015 
FPT Polytechnic Colleges 
Diploma in Computer Programming 
S KILLS
•
Technical Skills:
o
Have 3 years of experience Ruby on Rails framework
o
Have experience in TBD with RSpec
o
Have experience in front-end stack like React, Redux, React-Redux, Redux-Saga, and UI frameworks
like Bootstrap, Material-UI
o
Have knowledge of relational and NoSQL databases: MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis
o
Have experience in DevOps skills: Docker, Docker-Compose, Kubernetes, AWS EC2, GCP GKE
o
Have experience in designing multilingual applications
o
Have experience in manage microservice with Kong API gateway
o
Strong git workflow, GitHub Pull Request, GitLab Merge Request and CI
o
Familiar with Refactoring and Continuous Integration
o
Familiar with Agile process
•
Soft Skills:
o
Self-awareness tasks priority.
o
Can-do attitude.
o
Self-manage tasks.
o
Ability to work independently or on a team.
o
Strong written and verbal communication in English.
WORKING HISTORY 
Jul 2018 – present 
SkyLab Innogram - Full-stack Web Developer  
Nov 2016 – Jun 2018 
NUS Technology - Full-stack Ruby on Rails Developer  
Jul 2015 – Oct 2016 
Transcosmos Technologies - Junior Software Engineer 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
Jul 2018 – present 
Full-stack Web  Developer - SkyLab Innogram 
Project #2: DLC (Data Logistics Cloud) 
An end to end ecosystem driving synergies and network effects through improved Security, Latency and 
Scalability, across multi-generations of control systems over a large-scale network. 
Role: Developer 
Team size: 1 product manager, 1 team leader, 3 developers 
Duties: 
o 
Developed a Docker image Security Check feature used to evaluate the vulnerabilities of a 
Docker image before it will be pushed to production registry. 
o 
Developed an ACL feature used to grant permissions for each user/user group to perform some 
actions on a device. 
o 
Developed a deployment feature which allows the user to deploy an application from a private 
container registry to a selected worker node on Kubernetes cluster. 
o 
Developed some grouping features like Device Group which allows the user to group all related 
devices together. Also, SLA Group which allows setting the time range and total messages to be 
sent per hour that tied to devices. 
Technologies used: 
- 
Languages: Ruby, JavaScript 
- 
Framework: Ruby on Rails 
- 
Database: MySQL, Redis 
- 
Front-end stack: React, Redux, React-Redux, Redux-Saga, Material-UI 
- 
Deployment: Docker Swarm 
- 
Background job: Sidekiq 
- 
Source control: Git 
Project #3: SolarPVX 
This is a monitoring portal, the aim of this portal is allowing solar leasing companies and owners of solar 
PV systems to monitor remotely the energy and power production of their solar plants. This platform 
functions as a business intelligence tool, by allowing users to conduct an in-depth analysis of the 
performance of solar plants and compare the production of their solar plants. 
Role: Developer 
Team size: 1 product manager, 2 developers 
Duties: 
o 
Developed a reporting dashboard where to track and monitor the energy generated data for each 
unit like meter. 
o 
Develop an alarm rule feature which allows the monitoring assistant to create a specific rule to 
compare the generated data in a period of time to send an alert email when the comparison has 
matched the rule. 
Technologies used: 
- 
Languages: Ruby, JavaScript 
- 
Framework: Ruby on Rails 
- 
Front-end stack: C3JS 
- 
Database: MySQL, Redis 
- 
Deployment: Docker Swarm 
- 
Background job: Sidekiq 
- 
Source control: Git 
Nov 2016 – Jun 2018 
Full-stack Ruby on Rails Developer - NUS Technology 
Project #1: Welligence.com 
This project is an independent oil and gas analytics firm focused on the Latin America upstream sector. 
Their application of machine learning to proprietary exploration and production data represents a paradigm 
shift within upstream analytics. 
Role: Key Developer 
Team size: 1 project manager, 1 developer 
Duties: 
o 
Setting up EC2 instances as a distributed system to parallelize run analytics code. 
o 
Using Google Maps API to create a map to represent field, block, and well view as point or 
polygon. Also, apply clustering to make the map much friendlier. 
o 
Writing a bunch of scripts to scrape petroleum historical data from countries in Latin America 
which are datasets for Data Scientist to predict oil and gas reserves in future. 
o 
Integrate Microsoft Graph API and RubyXL library to writing a script that generate an asset report 
dynamically for clients to download. 
Technologies used: 
- 
Languages: Ruby, JavaScript 
- 
Framework: Ruby on Rails 
- 
Database: PostgreSQL, Redis 
- 
Hosting: Amazon EC2 and Amazon S3 
- 
Web server: Nginx 
- 
Application server: Puma 
- 
Front-end stack: jQuery, Bootstrap, Handsontable, ChartJS 
- 
Deployment: Capistrano 
- 
Background job: Sidekiq 
- 
Monitoring: NewRelic
- 
Third-party APIs: Microsoft Graph API, Google Maps API 
- 
Source control: Git 
Project #2: Plantribe.io 
This project is a marketplace to help architects, home designers, builders, and industry 
professionals to selling their house plan. 
Role: Developer 
Team size: 1 project manager, 1 business analyst, 1 quality control, 4 developers 
Duties: 
o 
Developed a storefront for the architects and home designers where they can post 
their design which has done before to show to customers. 
o 
Integrated the Stripe API to develop a payment and a subscription module for a 
marketplace web app. 
Technologies used: 
- Languages: Ruby, JavaScript 
- Framework: Ruby on Rails + Sharetribe 
- Database: MySQL 
- Hosting: Heroku 
- Image hosting: Amazon S3 
- Front-end stack: jQuery, Bootstrap 
- Deployment: Mina 
- Third-party APIs: Stripe API 
- Source control: Git 
Jul 2015 – Oct 2016 
Junior Software Engineer - Transcosmos Technologies 
Project #1: Company’s Redmine 
Developing a Redmine chart plugin for the company’s external used only. 
Technologies used: 
- 
Languages: Ruby, JavaScript 
- 
Framework: Ruby on Rails 
- 
Database: MySQL 
Project #2: Company’s Portal 
Customizing the Joomla framework to create a payment and a timesheet module for the 
company’s portal. 
Technologies used: 
- 
Languages: PHP, JavaScript 
- 
Framework: Joomla 
- 
Database: MySQL
